about_the_game:
A psychological horror game about the haunting experiences of Veronica’s family’s tragic death. Three years ago, Veronica’s family was killed in a fire that started in their home. No one survived except her. It was such a tragic event that led her to move from one house to another. Veronica is followed by a series of paranormal activities that lead her to have sleepless nights and nightmares. She is in a tormented state to end her endless nightmares. Will Veronica survive the haunting?

Features:

  • Immersive gameplay: Realistic graphics and sound design as well as minimal or no user interface to achieve a total immersive experience.
  • Flashlight: There is no other must-have in a dark place than a flashlight.
  • Chilling atmosphere: A chilling and creepy atmosphere that will enhance the sound design ambiance.
  • Intense jumpscares: GoodNight will give you nightmares when it comes to jumpscares. Scary ghost with scary and terrifying sounds equals perfect jumpscares.
  • Scary environment: It takes place in the early 1990's and gives the player a creepy vibe.
  • Realistic graphics: GoodNight comes with realistic graphics and design with volumetric lightings, real-time lights rendering, high-quality textures, and much more.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains realistic blood or gore and strong language such as profanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3200g or Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX supported card (5.1 channel support)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3200g or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GTX 970 or 1050ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 4gb or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX supported card (5.1 channel support)
